column5: In the code at line 209, there seems to be a "<TheoremResource>" but it is not rendering in the text.
In the code at line 903, there seems to be a "<TheoremResource>" but it is not rendering in the text.
In the code at line 1194, there seems to be an "<image source>" but it is not rendering in the text.
The problem refers to the graph of y = 1/x, but the graph of y = -1/x is shown.
Q1 asks to verify a function is even. Q2 should probably use this fact.  It only asks for a definite integral on [0,a] which does not rely on even/odd.
column6: Rewrite Q2 to evaluate the integral on the symmetric interval [-a,a].
